articles.title: 1st image of supermassive black hole at the center of Milky Way galaxy revealed - CNN
articles.description: For the first time, astronomers have captured an image of the supermassive black hole at the center of our Milky Way galaxy, confirming the presence of the cosmic object. It  is 4 million times more massive than our sun.
